wiki.name: What does your PLC do for you?
wiki.intro:
We can consider the participants in this course as a type of professional learning community (PLC). Add your thoughts here about what a PLC brings your practice. What are you learning? What does it mean to you? After all, you are putting in a lot of time into this course.

Click on the Edit tab to add your ideas. Be sure to include your name in parentheses after your addition.

As an added challenge, put it in 140 characters or less -- a Twitter-wiki!
